Package chatapplication_server

Class ComponentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatapplication_server.ComponentManager
  • public class ComponentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The component manager handles the starting and stopping of all system components. It also handles gracefull error recovery by terminating any running components and then quitting the program with an exit code equal to 1.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void fatalException​(java.lang.Exception e)
      Method invoked when a fatal exception occurs.
      static ComponentManager getInstance()
      Implementation of the getInstance() method.
      boolean startComponent​(java.lang.String componentName)
      Start the component corresponding to the given name.
      boolean startComponentsList​(java.util.LinkedList componentNames)
      Start the given list of components.
      void stopComponents()
      Shut down all the active ChatApplicationServer components in the reverse order from which they were started.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ComponentManager getInstance()
        Implementation of the getInstance() method. It returns the running instance of the ComponentManager

      • startComponentsList

        public boolean startComponentsList​(java.util.LinkedList componentNames)
        Start the given list of components.
        Parameters:
        componentNames - A list containing the names of the components to be started

      • startComponent

        public boolean startComponent​(java.lang.String componentName)
        Start the component corresponding to the given name.

      • stopComponents

        public void stopComponents()
        Shut down all the active ChatApplicationServer components in the reverse order from which they were started.

      • fatalException

        public void fatalException​(java.lang.Exception e)
        Method invoked when a fatal exception occurs. Cleanly shut down the LSCS system and exit.
        Parameters:
        e - A reference to the occurred exception
